post.title: 11 Ongoing Pornhwa To Check Out
post.body:
I thought I'd post a short list of the pornhwa whose new chapters I anticipate most.

## Theme 1: MC And His Bully

### Learning The Hard Way

MC becomes the home tutor of his bully, but she thinks studying is boring and would rather have sex.

### The Ark Is Me (aka Excuse Me, This Is My Room)

MC is an errand boy for his bully, one day he spends her college funds on a cryptocurrency investment and she's forced to move into his apartment.

### My High School Bully

MC has a gigantic dick and although many try no girl can fit his dick inside. A girl from his high school who used to bully him over his big dick got into the same college and she's warming up to the idea of giving it a try as well.

### Repeater (aka Unlucky Girl)

MC trades his university place for sex, but he gets conned. One year later he gets into the same university and he's looking for revenge.

### Queen Bee

post.title: Top 20 "Best" Pornhwa
post.body:
For fun I'll be going through these 20 pornhwa that were deemed to be the best by Hanumanth Reddy at AnimeUkiyo. Whenever I finish one I will add a short review together with a verdict to this post.

* * *

# 1\. Drug Candy

![drug-candy.jpg (1140x570)](data/img/post_3_drug-candy.jpg)

> There are no words to define how this manhwa affects you emotionally. It sure is an adult manhwa, but besides being an erotic story, the ending is truly amazing, or I should say, the **author conveyed the reality** rather than making it another regular finish.
> 
> **Seung-gu** is a hardworking person with a beautiful wife and a good job. But his personal life gets affected as he receives a demotion at work. The distance between both wife and husband grows continuously.
> 
> At this point, **he meets a young woman named Han Yura** as he gets to know her a little and somehow ends up addicted to her.
> 
> Soon he realizes that his mistakes cannot be corrected so easily. It is one of the best adult manhwa/adult webtoons of all time.

Status: **Complete**

[➔ Read _**Drug Candy**_ on ZeroNet](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/wasm/?!/g/126Temra5S4SmEpt1DVcxy1nhEJBhyUPvr/yihyeonmin_drug-candy_EN)

post.title: Petit-Roid 3 (Petit−ろいど３)
post.body:
![017b.jpg (703x214)](data/img/post_2_017b.jpg)

And who can honestly say they would not agree with that statement? Well, the protagonist of our three-volume manga here is not too stoked about the prospects of robo-girls, which is a real shame because only three pages into the story we find out his grandfather dropped off three cute loli-bots at his house.

Oh, and by the way: unless he has sex with them once every three days, their self-destruction protocol will trigger. So, yeah ... there's that.

This is all a good setup for some great sex scenes, but luckily there's also more plot than that: turns out his grandfather isn't the only pervert designing robo-girls, and the other ones are just as horny, possibly more. They're certainly more aggressive while looking to satisfy their desires.

* * *

## The Potential of Robo-Girl Transformation as a Means to Broaden the Target Demographic of a Manga

Mark my word: someone somewhere is crazy enough to publish a scientific paper with a title like that (and if you come across it, send me a link).

The three robo-girls in the manga can combine together into one of their adult forms. Alternatively two of them can transform into a teenage form as well. I've included three gifs in this post that show the different forms for each of the droids.

![mitsuki.gif (260x260)](data/img/post_2_mitsuki.gif) ![karin.gif (260x260)](data/img/post_2_karin.gif) ![kirara.gif (260x260)](data/img/post_2_kirara.gif)

One of the most obvious advantages of the transformative capabilities of the main cast is that it significantly increases the potential market for this manga. Not only do the robo-girls offer something to the loli, teen and adult fans, but they also broaden the variety of sex scenes without increasing the number of characters. This last point is one that a lot of other multi-volume manga struggle with: recurring sex scenes with the same character can get stale (Cheers handles this fairly well, I will probably write about those in more detail some day), but introducing a constant stream of new cast-members in turn hinders the character development that some people are looking for in these serialized works.

post.title: Hana's Holiday (Hana-san No Kyuujitsu)
post.body:
![000.jpg (561x786)](data/img/post_1_000.jpg)

# ハナさんの休日

**Hana's Holiday** (Read at [1+Gallery](/1PGaLLNiadMzrmw6MMMnpZnskwFcdgZoS4/?!/g/1G8VWDQc5fXLkRiijJB4EZerDLmDVY75MZ/saigado-hanasan-no-kyuujitsu-vol1)) is the story of an ordinary office lady who leads a secret life of indecency and carnal pleasures on her days off. This generally consists of showing her body in public and having intercourse with one or multiple strangers, often followed by her running into last nights partner in her professional life. This makes for a very episodic story where every chapter is the adventure of another one of her days off, starting and ending with a quick flyby view of her normal everyday life at the company. Because of this rhythm it's very easy to jump back into the story at any point when re-reading it.

* * *

![037b.jpg (923x900)](data/img/post_1_037b.jpg)

As someone with a thing for girls with glasses, the obvious let-down in this manga is that nearly every time things get lewd ... she's not wearing the glasses. But that's a small price to pay for what is an otherwise excellent read, and the last chapter of the first volume seems to be there to make up for this lack of glasses in the other sex scenes.

![244.jpg (942x472)](data/img/post_1_244.gif)

There is a scene in the third chapter that really caught my attention. Showing very little of what is happening and explaining nothing at all, Saigado still manages to convey the story to the reader very clearly with only a few “key frames”. I also think this scene captures the spirit and atmosphere of the story, and it does so playfully. Hana the huntress has cornered her prey in a public toilet.

![hanasan.jpg (669x900)](data/img/post_1_hanasan.jpg)

To be continued! Check back later :-)
